title: Smoked salmon and melon
ingredients: ['1½ chilled ripe Galia or Cantaloupe melons, seeds removed, sliced', 'Juice of ½ lime', '½ teaspoon preserved ginger, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'Salt and black pepper', '115g (4oz) smoked salmon slices', 'Lemon and lime wedges to serve']
